description: Listed building consent in association with dismantling, removal, storage and partial relocation of wrought iron latticework balustrade located over platforms 3 and 4 and removal of associated cast iron column on platform 3 of Farringdon London Underground Station.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Detailed drawings (at scale 1:50 with 1:10 details) and samples of materials in respect of the proposed means of enclosure of the lift lobby located between platforms 2 and 3, to include reuse of part of the wrought iron balustrade (as shown on the hereby approved drawings N222-NRT-DRG-AR-000012/P01 and N222-NRT-DRG-AR-000013/P01) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority before the relevant part of the work is begun. The development shall be implemented in strict accordance with the details so approved prior to 31/12/2012 and no change there from shall take place without the prior written consent of the local planning authority. 

REASON: To preserve the special architectural and historic interest of the listed building in accordance with PPS5 (Planning for the Historic Environment).
